pullRequest.title: Fix getting content length from public repo
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue #, if available:
Description of changes:
Fixes missing content length header which was not missing, but just had different capitalization.
Why is this change necessary:
How was this change tested:
Any additional information or context required to review the change:

By submitting this pull request, I confirm that you can use, modify, copy, and redistribute this contribution, under the terms of your choice.

nodes.bodyText:
nit: getContentLengthLong() returns it as a long
do we handle the -1 case when the content length is unknown?
